info.name: Execution_Stack_Smoke_Test
info.description: Smoke test for the execution stack / shelf.

item.name: Retrieve the list of KOs on the shelf
Add Test Knowledge Object to the shelf

exec: tests["Object Add Operation"] = responseBody.has("Object Added on the shelf");

item.name: Retrieve the detail of a KO on the shelf (with test)

exec: tests["Payload Content is not null"] = jsonData.payload.content !== null;
tests["Input Message is not null"] = jsonData.inputMessage !== null;
tests["Output Message is not null"] = jsonData.outputMessage !== null;
